introduction.html:div: This document delineates the OSEE milestone and release schedule from its current state to graduation from incubation.

release_deliverables.html:div: OSEE will provide both client and server update sites.

preamble.html:div: Approximate dates for the later milestones have not yet been determined.

milestone.html:div: First stable milestone build for graduation review

target_environments.html:div: In addition to continuing support for Windows, Solaris, and Linux, effort is being made to fully support versions of OS X that can support Ecilpse 3.5 and Java 6.

internationalization.html:div: Due to community demand, internationalization efforts have already begun, with tentative support for the German locale.

compatibility_with_previous_releases.html:div: Beginning with the 0.9 milestone, robust export/import utilities will be provided for migration to newer database schemas.

theme.name: Testability
theme.description: As OSEE matures, test coverage will be a crucial factor in maintaining the project and expanding the number of contributors.

theme.name: Documentation
theme.description: Thorough and up-to-date documentation is a crucial factor in enabling productive collaboration from the entire development community.
